sentences.english: When a man walks into a room, he brings his whole life with him.
sentences.chinese: 當一個男人選擇安身立命，他揹負着自己的一生。

sentences.english: Yet the networks of relationships in which firms are embedded profoundly influence their conduct and performance.
sentences.chinese: 企業安身立命的關係網卻深刻地影響其行爲與績效。

sentences.english: And, from this condition, I try to find my bearings.
sentences.chinese: 從我自身的情況，我設法找到我的安身立命之道。

sentences.english: But, as people living in the world, many worry in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在安身立命爲人處世間，諸多煩惱糾纏於心。

sentences.english: House is the root of taking shelter and living. It's also the basic living capital.
sentences.chinese: 房屋是安身立命的根木，是基本的生活資料。

sentences.english: Have a shelter, has been the first people to settle down requirements.
sentences.chinese: 有住房，一直是第一人安身立命的要求。
